long.am,bn,ca,el,es_419,fa,gu,he,hi,hu,kn,lt,:
Snipo is the best way to take video notes directly to the Notion pages in click

This extension enables you to:
  â˜… take clickable timestamped YouTube notes
  â˜… capture screenshots on videos and elevate your learning
  â˜… seamless sync YouTube videos with Notion (sync title, chapters, and YouTube playlist)
  â˜… organize your videos into notebooks with index for the playlist in Notion
  â˜… keyboard shortcuts (Speed up and down, seek backward and forward, pause, timestamp note, capture screenshot, etc.) 
  â˜… mark as finished on notion page

Snipo is a notebook for online courses, enabling you to learn and study effectively across the web on any platform(Youtube, etc.) to Notion

After installing, please reload all tabs for the extension to take effect. For issues/suggestions, please contact us via email: hello@snipo.io

---
â“˜This Chrome extension is about note taking and has no affiliations with the popular Notionâ„¢ or YouTubeâ„¢
